attributes.action: Intervene in the granting of planning permission for the proposed Dudley Mosque
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition is to stop the planning permission being granted for another mosque to be built in Dudley West Midlands.  There are allegedly only about seven and a half thousand muslims in Dudley in an area populated by over onehundred and fifty thousand people.  There are enough mosques to satisfy their needs, without blighting the landscape of our medieval town.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
